casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. EBERHARDT
v.
JANIK 2018-1367 Supreme Court of Ohio. September 27, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

In Habeas Corpus. Sua sponte, petitioner ordered to be released from custody immediately. Further proceedings by respondent are stayed pursuant to this temporary interim order pending a ruling by this court on the emergency motion for bond and request for alternative writs. Respondent ordered to file a response, if any, to both the petition for writ of habeas corpus and emergency motion for bond and request for alternative writs no later than Tuesday, October 2, 2018.
